DashboardDefinitionComponents.Name: JobTypes
DashboardDefinitionComponents.Parameters:
[{"WidgetSubTitle":"","WidgetType":"grid","WidgetFilterField":"","WidgetColor":"","WidgetFrameStyle":{},"WidgetXPosition":0,"WidgetYPosition":0,"WidgetRows":23,"WidgetColumns":48,"WidgetHeader":{"showTitle":false,"showSubTitle":false,"WidgetMetrics":{"visible":false,"Metrics":[]},"WidgetPeriodChooser":{"visible":false,"type":"","startDate":null,"endDate":null}},"WidgetDataSources":{"main":{"type":"querytext","value":"Select 
    j.Oid, 
    j.Name, 
    j.Code, 
    j.DurationDays, 
    j.Active,
    c.Name as Company, 
    v.Name as Division, 
    d.Name as Department,
    doc.Name as Document,
	w.Name as Workflow
from JobType j
Inner Join Company c on j.Company=c.Oid
Inner join Division v on j.Division=v.Oid
Inner join Department d on j.Department=d.Oid
Inner join Document doc on j.Document=doc.Oid
Left Join DocumentType w on j.Workflow=w.Oid
where j.GCRecord IS NULL","mapping":""}},"Filters":{},"QueryConfiguration":{"PreviousPeriod":{"Show":false,"KeyFieldName":"","Type":0},"RequiredFilters":[]}}]
